metadata.title: CVE-2021-21783 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the WS-Addressing pluginfunctionality of Genivia gSOAP 2.8.107. A specially crafted SOAP requestcan lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gsoap package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
